data.text: @SharylAttkisson Adding "Someday attend an engagement where Sharyl is a keynote speaker" to my bucket list.  I appreciate that she trusts her audience enough to think for themselves.  I find that approach so essential (and refreshing) in today's world. https://t.co/gl17W5OUE2
@SharylAttkisson Biden's "control" fetish is only available if he's able to continue his fear mongering!
@SharylAttkisson 8 days ago Biden extended the emergency powers act. No reason to do so except to keep power. Disgusting.

@SharylAttkisson Admittedly this is probably not the robust discussion you were looking for but since Biden is a nitwit, I donâ€™t agree with him. It was his only platform plank and he has failed miserably at it.  He has taken two years from people and scarred our children.  He is despicable.
@SharylAttkisson The true emergency is the unprecedented number of deaths and injuries caused by the toxic EAU jabs...and the Biden Admin push to get them into the arms of precious little children.
@SharylAttkisson When it fits his narrative..it will be over tomorrow night..
@SharylAttkisson Only reason he declares still in Emergency is so he has unlimited powers he would not otherwise have. It is over, has been over.
@SharylAttkisson We've never been in a real emergency. No public health was practiced during this entire thing.
